name: Spanish Shrimp & Rice

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Spinach Dip Mix

preparation: Dice peppers and zucchini. Place in Round Steamer. Add seasoning; stir to evenly coat.
Stir in water, broth mix, and rice. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 16–18 min, until rice is tender.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, toss frozen shrimp and peas with smoked paprika; stir into cooked rice mix. Cover, then microwave on high, 2 min or until shrimp are warmed through.
Spoon into bowls and top with a dollop of aioli and add fresh cilantro, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 tbsp Epicure Aioli, your choice.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Spinach Dip Mix
summary: Punchy blend with onion & sweet bell pepper.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Smoked Spanish Paprika
summary: Experience a smoky flavor that comes from slowly drying peppers over an open fire.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
